(intIssueWidth, power_logic).explanation: Increasing integer issue width requires more complex instruction scheduling logic, dispatch units, and execution pipelines, directly increasing the logic power consumption;

(intIssueWidth, power_leakage).explanation: Wider issue width necessitates more transistors in execution units, register files, and scheduling logic, directly increasing the total leakage power;

(intIssueWidth, area_cell_area).explanation: Higher integer issue width requires additional execution units, larger register files, and more complex scheduling hardware, directly increasing the cell area;
